Uses of Class
java.util.zip.Inflater

Packages that use Inflater
java.util.zip Provides classes for reading and writing the standard ZIP and GZIP file formats. 
 

Uses of Inflater in java.util.zip
 

Fields in java.util.zip declared as Inflater
protected  Inflater InflaterOutputStream.inf
          Decompressor for this stream.
protected  Inflater InflaterInputStream.inf
          Decompressor for this stream.
 

Constructors in java.util.zip with parameters of type Inflater

          Creates a new input stream with the specified decompressor and a default buffer size.

          Creates a new input stream with the specified decompressor and buffer size.
InflaterOutputStream(OutputStream out, Inflater infl)
          Creates a new output stream with the specified decompressor and a default buffer size.
InflaterOutputStream(OutputStream out, Inflater infl, int bufLen)
          Creates a new output stream with the specified decompressor and buffer size.
